settings.subheading: We can make any photo, drawing, pattern or sketch into a custom mosaic art piece…
settings.heading: Custom Order

settings.text: Custom Order Services
Aloft Tiles provides the most extensive range of unique floor, wall tiles and murals in the nation. If your project calls for something unique, our Custom Order Services offer personalized solutions.
Our Process

settings.heading: 1. Get in Touch
settings.text: Feel free to get in touch with our team of design consultants, who will explore your project, vision, concept, and preferences with you.

settings.heading: 2. Design
settings.text: Our team of skilled artists will transform your vision into a design ready for installation.

settings.heading: 3. Create
settings.text: Our project management department will collaborate with factories to expedite the order and ensure prompt delivery to you.

settings.heading: 4. Project Samples
settings.text: Should your project require samples, kindly inform us if you would like a sample board.

settings.heading: 5. Worldwide Delivery
settings.text: We ensure that your order is delivered right to your door, regardless of your global location.
Custom Large Format Tiles

Experience the grandeur of large format tiles crafted from stone and porcelain for both residential and commercial projects. At Aloft Tile, we specialize in sourcing tiles of any size and color to match your precise vision. Our commitment to excellence extends to analyzing technical specifications for your project, ensuring that every detail is accounted for, from durability to aesthetics.

These large format tiles not only make a bold design statement but also offer practicality and versatility, making them ideal for a wide range of applications in both residential and commercial spaces. Whether you're envisioning a sleek, contemporary office interior or a luxurious, spacious home, our large format tiles are the perfect foundation for your project.
Custom Mosaic Murals and Mosaic Wall Art

At Aloft Tiles we’re in the business of making your design dreams come true. Our approach is simple yet profound: we collaborate with you to craft bespoke mosaic masterpieces based on your specific requests and inspirations.

Imagine having the freedom to dictate every element of your mosaic, from the choice of materials to the intricacies of the design. With us, that vision becomes a reality. We're not confined to a fixed catalog; instead, we thrive on the diversity of our clients' ideas and preferences.

Our skilled artisans are passionate about their craft, and they take pride in turning your concepts into tangible works of art. Whether it's a mosaic mural that tells the story of your family's heritage or a mosaic backsplash that perfectly complements your kitchen's color scheme, we have the expertise and dedication to bring your ideas to life.

The process begins with a collaborative consultation where we delve deep into your vision, discussing everything from color palettes and materials to design styles and project timelines. We listen carefully to your needs, ensuring that every detail is considered.

Once the concept is refined and approved, our artisans get to work, meticulously handcrafting each piece of your mosaic with precision and care. We use only the highest-quality materials, sourced for their beauty and durability, to guarantee that your mosaic will stand the test of time.

Our commitment to you doesn't end with the completion of your project. We're dedicated to ensuring your complete satisfaction, from the initial concept to the final installation. We're here to answer your questions, address any concerns, and make adjustments as needed to ensure that your custom mosaic is a true reflection of your vision.

At Aloft Tiles, we believe that your space should be a reflection of your unique style and personality. That's why we're here to help you create one-of-a-kind mosaic artworks that elevate your surroundings and inspire awe. Collaborate with us to turn your ideas into stunning mosaic realities, and experience the joy of owning a piece of art that is uniquely yours.
Kitchen Mosaics & Backsplash

Upgrade your kitchen with our stunning mosaic backsplash designs. These functional pieces of art not only protect your walls but also add a vibrant and stylish focal point to your culinary haven. Choose from a variety of materials and patterns to complement your kitchen's aesthetics.
Mosaic Logos

Elevate your brand's identity with our custom mosaic logo designs. Whether it's for your business entrance, office lobby, or any other space, our mosaic logos infuse your brand with elegance and a touch of artistic flair.
Mosaic Logos

Elevate your brand's identity with our custom mosaic logo designs. Whether it's for your business entrance, office lobby, or any other space, our mosaic logos infuse your brand with elegance and a touch of artistic flair.
Custom Pool Murals

Dive into luxury with our exquisite pool mosaics. Our mosaic artisans create captivating underwater worlds, from serene seascapes to playful dolphins, turning your pool into a stunning oasis of beauty and relaxation.
Mosaic Mural and Art for Restaurants

Enhance the ambiance of your restaurant with our bespoke mosaic art installations. From vibrant murals that tell a story to intricate tabletops that spark conversation, our mosaic creations create a unique dining experience that leaves a lasting impression on your patrons.
Bathroom Mosaics

Elevate your bathroom to a spa-like retreat with our exquisite bathroom mosaic designs. These meticulously crafted mosaics turn your bathroom into a sanctuary of beauty and relaxation. From stunning shower walls to intricate floor patterns, our bathroom mosaics offer a unique and luxurious touch to your personal space.
Public Art Installations

Transform public spaces into vibrant cultural hubs with our custom mosaic art installations. Whether it's a city project, a school, a university campus, or a business, we collaborate with you to create awe-inspiring, site-specific mosaic artworks that engage, inspire, and leave a lasting impact on the community.

These mosaic installations have the power to not only beautify public areas but also foster a sense of pride and identity among residents, students, and employees. Our experienced team of mosaic artists is dedicated to bringing your creative vision to life, ensuring that these public art projects become cherished landmarks that enrich the lives of those who interact with them.

settings.heading: Ready To Get Started?
settings.description:
You can also fill out the form below with a description of your mosaic project. If you have a photo, drawing, pattern or sketch you can upload it here.

We can make any photo, drawing, pattern or sketch into a custom mosaic art piece. Don’t have anything to upload? Thats fine too, just send us a description of your project, we can develop a drawing later.
